Manhattan, NY

6-8PM COST: $20

Studio 12B

LOCATION: BASIC BALLROOM DANCE LOFT

                 NY, NY 10001

TIME: 10pm- 3am

DRESS: SEXY CHIC

COST:  $25 (w/o Weekend Package)

519 8TH AVENUE, 12 FLOOR - 12B
New York, NY
COST $20

 

 

 

STEPPIN IN CENTRAL PARK

3:00-7:00PM
Where: SUMMIT ROCK (African-American Historic Site), CENTRAL PARK WEST
ENTER 85TH ST PATH UP HILL ON RIGHT

BRING YOUR STEPPIN' SHOES!

REP YOUR CITY OR ORGANIZATION with your T-shirt!

COST: FREE! w/ LUNCH COURTESY OF NEW YORK STEPPERS

 

SATURDAY NIGHT-- THE MAIN EVENT

9PM-2AM
NEW YORKER HOTEL BALLROOM
481 8TH Ave. AT 34th St.

Cost: $30 (w/o Weekend Package)
DRESS CODE:  STEPPERS SHARP!
MUSICAL HOST:  DJ ROCKIN' RODNEY MACK! (Detroit)

 

SUNDAY-- FAREWELL STEPPERS SET

12noon-3:30pm
Where: TAJ LOUNGE
48 W. 21ST. St. (bet. 5th &6th Aves)
NEW YORK

COST: $15 (w/o Package)


EARLY BIRD WEEKEND PACKAGE!   $55 (until May 31, 2012)

ALL-INCLUSIVE:   FRIDAY NIGHT KICK OFF SET-- Basic Ballroom Dance Loft

SATURDAY AFTERNOON-- Steppin' In Central Park
                             SATURDAY NIGHT-- The Main Event at New Yorker Ballroom
                             SUNDAY-- Farewell Steppers Set




 INDIVIDUAL STEPPERS SET TICKETS (until May 31, 2012)
                               FRIDAY NIGHT KICK OFF SET-- $25
                             SATURDAY NIGHT MAIN EVENT-- $30
                             SUNDAY STEPPERS FAREWELL SET-- $15

DETAILS and PAYMENT:   http://www.bigcityweekend.com/3/miscellaneous1.htm

BIG STEPPIN WEEKEND ON FACEBOOK

 BUS FOR THE TRIP, DEPENDS ON RSVP'S

 BUS DETAILS

  Cost:  $49 per person for Steppers 

SUPPORTING ACTIVE TOSOB STEPPERS as of 5/27/2012 COST $40 round trip

$10 DEPOSITE REQUIRED TO LOCK IN THIS RATE IN ORDER TO RECEIVE $40 PRICING

DEADLINE JUNE 14, 2012 FOR DEPOSITE

Seating is based on availability AFTER the 20 guaranteed
seats.

Round trip motor coach transportation "to the door" at host hotel (The New Yorker Hotel.) 

Bus will NOT be available to TOSOB after drop off
on Saturday. 

Bus will return to hotel for return departure at 2:30PM for
luggage loading time, and 3PM for departure time

Bus itinerary is as follows:
Departure Saturday, July 28, 2012
Time:  5:45AM sharp from Mattapan River Street MBTA ST  

Return Sunday, July 29, 2012
Time:  3PM sharp


TOSOB Steppers 50% refundable deposit due to make reservation, secure pricing. ONLY.
Discounted seating conditions listed above for only 20 seat for ACTIVE TOSOB STEPPERS 

NON TOSOB STEPPERS $25 deposite required.

ALL STEPPERS DEPOSITE REQUIRED JUNE 14, 2012

 

Final balance due 14 days in advance of trip departure July 13, 2012

One regular sized cooler filled with ice will be supplied.  BYOB and food. 

Bathroom, satellite radio, IPOD plug in and DVD player all
provided on bus
